meanings.definition: Not directed or controlled by a guide or leader.
meanings.sent1: The unguided rocket soared into the sky without any help.
meanings.sent2: The hiker took an unguided path through the forest.
meanings.sent3: The unguided puppy ran in circles, unsure of where to go.
meanings.sent4: Her unguided decisions led her down unexpected paths.
meanings.sent5: The unguided boat drifted aimlessly on the calm lake.

meanings.definition: Not accompanied or assisted by a guide or instructor.
meanings.sent1: The unguided students struggled to find their way in the museum.
meanings.sent2: The unguided tourists explored the city on their own.
meanings.sent3: The unguided team got lost during the scavenger hunt.
meanings.sent4: His unguided attempts at cooking often resulted in burnt meals.
meanings.sent5: The unguided traveler wandered through the foreign streets with curiosity.
